import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { ReactComponent as Logo } from '../../assets/crown.svg' import { auth, signInWithGoogle } from '../../firebase/firebase.utils' import { onAuthStateChanged, signOut } from 'firebase/auth' import './header.styles.scss' const Header = ({ currentUser }) => (
SHOP CONTACT {currentUser ? (
auth.signOut()}> SIGN OUT
) : ( SIGN IN )}
) export default Header
